ModMetaData.name: Scrap Collector
ModMetaData.author: Velcroboy
ModMetaData.description: One person's junk is another person's scrap. Deconstruct ancient debris for pieces of rusty scrap. Research an industrial-tech method of isolating metals at the molecular level and extract them from the scrap. The process is slower and less efficient than smelting pure slag. However, ancient scrap may yield any of the various metals at random.\n\nWhat's more?!? Move and use the storage structures left behind by the Ancients. Hoard their rusty old beds and use their surgery tables for emergency ogan removal. Find some razor wire laying around...Use it to harm and slow down intruders. Or build new and stronger razor wire defenses with all that new steel you just extracted. Like those cement fences you see? Build them and keep your livestock safe.
